trans-unit.source: The WmiConfiguration attribute indicates that an assembly contains code that implements a WMI provider by using the WMI.NET Provider Extensions model.
trans-unit.target: WmiConfiguration 屬性指出某個組件包含使用 WMI.NET 提供者延伸模組模型實作 WMI 提供者的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The attribute accepts parameters that establish the high-level configuration of the implemented WMI provider.
trans-unit.target: 屬性，接受建立實作的 WMI 提供者之高層級組態的參數。

trans-unit.source: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 注意：WMI .NET 程式庫目前被視為最終狀態，針對影響這些程式庫的非安全性相關問題，不會提供進一步的開發、增強功能或更新。

trans-unit.source: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.
trans-unit.target: [MI API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) 應使用於所有新的開發。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the parameters accepted by this attribute along with what aspect of the provider configuration it enables you to control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出這個屬性，以及提供者設定的哪個方面可讓您控制所接受的參數。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: Configures
trans-unit.target: 設定

trans-unit.source: The namespace in which your provider exposes classes.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間，您的提供者會公開類別。

trans-unit.source: - The security (DACL) on the namespace used.
trans-unit.target: 層使用的命名空間安全性 (DACL)。

trans-unit.source: - The hosting model that will be used by the provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供者會使用-裝載模型。

trans-unit.source: - The impersonation mode of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 的提供者模擬模式。

trans-unit.source: The hosting group that the provider belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 主控提供者所屬群組中。

trans-unit.source: This parameter only applies to in-process providers.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數只適用於同處理序提供者。

trans-unit.source: The security (DACL) on the WMI provider.
trans-unit.target: 安全性 (DACL) 上的 WMI 提供者。

trans-unit.source: The WMI namespace in which the provider will expose classes.
trans-unit.target: WMI 命名空間，提供者會在此公開類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, "root\MyProviderNamespace".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"root\MyProviderNamespace"。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.WmiConfigurationAttribute" /> class that specifies the WMI namespace in which the WMI provider will expose classes.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.WmiConfigurationAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，以指定 WMI 提供者會在其中公開類別的 WMI 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A WMI provider must expose its classes in a namespace.
trans-unit.target: WMI 提供者必須公開其命名空間中的類別。

trans-unit.source: That is why the constructor requires scope as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這就是為什麼建構函式必須做為參數的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosting group for the WMI provider.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 WMI 提供者的裝載群組。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> value that indicates the hosting group for the WMI provider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，表示 WMI 提供者的裝載群組。

trans-unit.source: Hosting groups only apply to providers that are hosted in-process.
trans-unit.target: 裝載群組只會套用到提供者裝載同處理序。

trans-unit.source: The value is ignored for decoupled providers.
trans-unit.target: 低耦合提供者會忽略的值。

trans-unit.source: A hosting group is a set of in-process providers that are all assigned the same hosting group name.
trans-unit.target: 主機群組是一組都指定相同的主機群組名稱的同處理序提供者。

trans-unit.source: The hosting group name is a string that you define to logically group the providers.
trans-unit.target: 裝載的群組名稱是您定義用來將提供者以邏輯方式分組的字串。

trans-unit.source: All of the in-process providers in the same hosting group running under the same security context are hosted within a single instance of the Wmiprvse.exe process.
trans-unit.target: 所有相同的安全性內容下執行相同的主機群組中的同處理序提供者會裝載於 Wmiprvse.exe 程序的單一執行個體。

trans-unit.source: So, providers that share the same hosting group and security context share the same service host process.
trans-unit.target: 因此，共用相同的主機群組和安全性內容的提供者會共用相同的服務主機處理序。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.WmiConfigurationAttribute> is used to indicate that the assembly it is contained in implements an in-process provider that runs under the NetworkService security context and is hosted in a instance of the Wmiprvse.exe process that also hosts any other in-process providers in the same hosting group that also run within the NetworkService security context.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.WmiConfigurationAttribute>用來表示，它包含在組件會實作也會裝載任何 Wmiprvse.exe 程序的執行個體的 NetworkService 安全性內容下執行，而裝載同處理序提供者其他同處理序提供者相同的主機群組中，也 NetworkService 安全性內容中執行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosting model for the WMI provider.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 WMI 提供者的裝載模型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel" /> value that indicates the hosting model of the WMI provider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel" /> 值，表示 WMI 提供者的裝載模型。

trans-unit.source: WMI providers can be hosted by an application or by the WMI service.
trans-unit.target: WMI 提供者可裝載的應用程式或 WMI 服務。

trans-unit.source: WMI providers hosted by an application are called decoupled providers.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式所裝載的 WMI 提供者稱為 「 低耦合提供者。

trans-unit.source: Those hosted by the WMI service are called in-process providers.
trans-unit.target: 透過 WMI 服務來裝載群組則稱為同處理序提供者。

trans-unit.source: The hosting model value determines both the hosting model and, in the case of in-process providers, the account (security context) under which the provider runs.
trans-unit.target: 裝載模型的值會判斷這兩種裝載模型，在同處理序提供者，提供者所執行的帳戶 （安全性內容） 的情況下。

trans-unit.source: For more detail about the possible values of HostingModel, see <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 HostingModel 的可能值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel>。

trans-unit.source: To learn more about hosting models, see the [Provider Hosting and Security](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100075) topic in the WMI SDK on MSDN.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解有關裝載模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[裝載提供者和安全性](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100075)MSDN 上的 WMI SDK 中的主題。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.WmiConfigurationAttribute> is used to indicate that the assembly it is contained in implements a provider that is exposed through the root\NVPair namespace.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.WmiConfigurationAttribute>用來表示它包含在組件實作的提供者會公開 root\NVPair 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Because the hosting model is not <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel.Decoupled>, it is an in-process provider.
trans-unit.target: 因為不是裝載模型<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel.Decoupled>，它是同處理序提供者。

trans-unit.source: The value <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel.NetworkService> indicates that the in-process provider runs under the NetworkService security context.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel.NetworkService>表示 NetworkService 安全性內容下執行同處理序提供者。

trans-unit.source: In the next example, the <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.WmiConfigurationAttribute> is used to indicate that the assembly it is contained in implements a provider that is exposed through the root\NVPair namespace.
trans-unit.target: 在下一個範例中，<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.WmiConfigurationAttribute>用來表示它包含在組件實作的提供者會公開 root\NVPair 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The value <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel.Decoupled> indicates that it is a decoupled provider.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel.Decoupled>表示它是低耦合提供者。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the WMI provider can impersonate its callers.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定 WMI 提供者是否可模擬其呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: If the value is false, the provider cannot impersonate, and if the value is true, the provider can impersonate.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為 false，則提供者不能模擬，如果值為 true，提供者就可以模擬。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a provider can or cannot impersonate its callers.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出提供者是否可以模擬其呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: If the value is false, the provider cannot impersonate, and if the value is true, the provider can impersonate.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為 false，則提供者不能模擬，如果值為 true，提供者就可以模擬。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Provider Hosting and Security" topic in the MSDN library online at [http://www.msdn.com](http://www.msdn.com/).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱在線上 MSDN library 中的 「 提供者裝載與安全性 」 主題[ http://www.msdn.com ](http://www.msdn.com/)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the IdentifyLevel parameter to indicate that the provider can impersonate its callers.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用 IdentifyLevel 參數來指出提供者可以模擬其呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) string that specifies the security descriptor on the namespace in which the provider exposes management objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) 字串，指定命名空間上的安全性描述元 (Security Descriptor)，提供者在此命名空間中公開管理物件。

trans-unit.source: An SDDL string that represents the security descriptor on the namespace in which the provider exposes management objects.
trans-unit.target: SDDL 字串，表示命名空間上的安全性描述元 (Security Descriptor)，提供者會在此命名空間中公開管理物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to represent security descriptors in SDDL format, see the [Security Descriptor String Format](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100763) topic in the MSDN library online.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何表示 SDDL 格式中的安全性描述項的詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性描述元字串格式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100763)MSDN library 中的主題。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the NamespaceSecurity parameter to set the security descriptor on the root/SDTest namespace in which the provider implemented in this assembly exposes WMI classes.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用命名空間安全性參數來實作這個組件中的提供者會公開 WMI 類別的根/SDTest 命名空間上設定的安全性描述元。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WMI namespace in which the WMI provider exposes classes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 WMI 命名空間，WMI 提供者會在此命名空間中公開類別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> value that indicates the namespace in which the WMI provider exposes classes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，表示 WMI 提供者在其中公開類別的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A WMI namespace is a category within the WMI repository.
trans-unit.target: WMI 命名空間是 WMI 儲存機制內的分類。

trans-unit.source: The commonly-used root/cimv2 namespace houses classes that describe the Common Information Model, Version 2, defined by the Desktop Management Task Force (DMTF) consortium.
trans-unit.target: 常用的 root/cimv2 命名空間上存放了描述以通用訊息模型，第 2 版協會桌面管理任務推動小組 (DMTF) 所定義的類別。

trans-unit.source: You should only expose your providers in that namespace if you expanding upon the standand CIM model.
trans-unit.target: 您只應該公開您的提供者，該命名空間中，如果您只 CIM 模型上展開。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you should create an appropriate namespace that makes clear to users the type of WMI classes they can expect to find in the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 否則，您應建立適當的命名空間，讓使用者他們可以預期的命名空間中找不到 WMI 類別的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a security descriptor for the WMI provider.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 WMI 提供者的安全性描述元 (Security Descriptor)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the SecurityDescriptor property information in the "__Win32Provider" topic in the MSDN online library at [http://www.msdn.com](http://www.msdn.com/).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Online Library ([http://www.msdn.com](http://www.msdn.com/))＜__Win32Provider＞主題中，有關 SecurityDescriptor 屬性的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> value that contains the security descriptor for the WMI provider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，其中包含 WMI 提供者的安全性描述元。
